pages.text:
$
$
$
$
$
$
Who Are We?
/$
$
Steve Waterman, Director of OAC
/$
$
Years of teaching and parenthood has allowed me to experience firsthand the value of outdoor adventure activities for both kids and adults. Born and raised in Florida (Yes, one of the few!), I have had the pleasure of enjoying surfing, kayaking, paddle boarding, mountain biking, hiking, camping, and more in our great outdoors. It's important now more than ever to spread the joys and adventures of the outdoors to the next generation!
/$
$
/$
/$
/$
$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
Meet our Team
/$
$
$
$
/$
$
Lead Counselor
/$
$
Scott Crooke
/$
$
Scott has been part of our OAC Family for over 10 years! His passion for exploring the world around us, and helping children connect to the outdoors, enables Scott to create memorable experiences for all OAC Campers! Scott is our top paddle board and surfing expert and always knows where to find the best waves for the most radical experiences.
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
Lead Counselor
/$
$
Jan Michael-Scott
/$
$
Jan, better known as Coach Scott, has been leading children into the world of health and enjoying the outdoors for most of his life. In addition to being a school PE teacher, Coach Scott is a devoted skateboarder, and loves teaching students the importance of building a strong mind and body! Coach Scott is our dedicated kayak instructor and mentor.
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
Counselor
/$
$
Rich Colville
/$
$
Our campers are very lucky to have someone as kind, helpful, and fun as Coach Rich! Coach is always quick to help kids with their paddle stroke, play a new game, or find a way to conquer a new route while rock climbing. He knows how to make any activity fun, and always takes the time to ensure kids are having a great experience.
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
Counselors
/$
$
The Crew!
/$
$
Over the years our former campers have returned as Junior Counselors, and are favorites of all our campers!
Luke and Sarah, Steve's children, have been leading Junior Counselors for years, and supported by close friends Luca and Hannah, who have been with OAC since they were the youngest of campers!

$
$
$
Events
/$
$
We currently do not have any special events planned!
/$
$
Interested in a special event for your family, club, group, or party? Special events we have been involved in include:
Birthday Parties
​Paddle with Pups
Family Celebrations
Holiday Paddle Groups
Scout Groups
Waterway Cleanup
​Team Building
​
Interesting in setting up an event for your group? Contact us!
Steve Waterman
waterman.oac@gmail.com
386-871-0469
